---
title: "Page-section Example"
filters:
  - page-section
---

::: {.page-section id='dashboard'}

This filter creates a HTML markup for a page section.
\
\
This code

```md
::: {.page-section .text-primary id='dashboard'}
The content.
:::
```

produces:

```html
<div class="page-section text-primary page-section-dashboard">
  <div class="page-section-content container page-section-dashboard__content">
    The content
  </div>
</div>
```

:::
